about_the_game:
Welcome to nightshift! You are a retired Detective, and you get a note in your office from the police department but, upon the note you have to find out who murdered Kakig Kasajian but in the house it won't be easy to find the Killer. Now just remember, always look but never look in the past


【Game Features】:
-- investigate the haunted house, and find out who Killed Kakig Kasajian –
- You can switch on and off the CCTV
- New jump scare
-Inventory items available to player.
-Number and types of enemies in the game.


-- 2021 New Combat Mode— investigate –
Introduce the new first-person view mode. Become an investigator to find out the truth. BUT it won't be easy. Grab a flashlight gun and keys, kill the zombies, take away the flashlight, and become the only one in the game! Stay alert and alive!

-- The story of Kakig Kasajian –
He was born and grew up in a needy family in an important town, he lived out of trouble until he was about 16 years old, but at that point everything changed.

He lost his sisters in a natural disaster and was forsaken by all. While pursued by strangers he had to survive in a vicious world. But with his determination and persistence, he managed to overpower anybody who's a hindrance and escape hell. This has turned him into the man he is today.






“We’re so busy watching out for what’s just ahead of us that we don’t take time to enjoy where we are.” ― Bill Watterson

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core i3 540 or AMD A6-3620 or higher
  • Memory: 7 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X 11.0 compliant video card with 1GB RAM (NVidia GeForce 460 or AMD Radeon 6850)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 852 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core i5 2300 or AMD FX4350
  • Memory: 10 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X 11.0 compliant video card with 2GB RAM (NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 750 or AMD Radeon™ HD 7850) or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 862 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
